channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0364; 08:07AM; 6124 N Corbin Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3vFpDi5; #Tarzana; The first 34 firefighters extinguished flames in 30 minutes, inside of a home with a steep-pitched roof, which had both one- and two-story portions. No reported injuries. While the fire appeared to have come from an area near the chimney, the exact cause is still under investigation.; FS 93; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; E293 T93 E84 E73 E273 T73 E93 RA105 RA100 BC17 BC15 RA93 SO1 E305 T105 E100 CM42 EM17 BC10 CM40 E104 ; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0385; 08:22AM; 1069 W 6th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/48F4RxO; #Westlake; Firefighters ascended the stairwell of the four-story vacant office building and located a trash fire on the third floor. The flames were extinguished quickly, but smoke had made its way throughout the building. Crews will remain on scene using blowers to systematically evacuate the smoke from the building room by room, and remove any remaining smoldering materials. It took 48 firefighters 33 minutes to access and extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 3; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 1; E3 T3 E203 RA803 RA3 E11 E9 T9 SQ21 BC1 BC11 UR3 CM22 RA11 E10 E220 T20 EM1 BC13 CM20 EA1 ; CH7; 12 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0385; 07:49AM; 1069 W 6th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/48F4RxO; #Westlake; Four-story vacant office building with smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 3; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 1; CH9; 12 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0364; 07:37AM; 6124 N Corbin Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3vFpDi5; #Tarzana; Two-story home with heavy smoke showing. Offensive mode. ; FS 93; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

title.a: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire 01/17/2024 INC#0127

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0127; 03:31AM; 1337 N Cherokee Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Hto9dj; #Hollywood; Firefighters responding to reports of smoke in the area arrived to find a one-story single-family home with fire showing. While initiating an offensive fire attack, the first engine company found two people trapped behind a security gate inside the structure. Firefighters used forcible entry tools to access the area, and rescued two adult males, who were both transported to a local hospital (1 critical, 1 grave). During the rescue, the fire continued to grow. The engine company resumed fire attack operations after rescuing the two patients, however the fire had grown rapidly. The crew was inside the structure when a flashover occurred. One member was found to have burns on their ears, but all four members of the crew were transported for observation at the hospital. Ultimately, it took 48 firefighters 31 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames. PIO Captain Adam VanGerpen is en route (ETA 5:10am) for media requests. The cause of the fire is under active investigation.; FS 27; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC18 BC5 CM20 CM22 CM51 E203 E210 E227 E235 E261 E27 E3 E41 E52 E61 E82 EA1 EM11 EM5 HR3 PH1 PI2 RA27 RA3 RA41 RA52 RA61 RA803 RA82 RA827 SQ21 T10 T27 T3 T35 T61 UR3 UR88; CH7; 12 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0127; 03:00AM; 1337 N Cherokee Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Hto9dj; #Hollywood; One-story single family home with heavy smoke showing. ; FS 27; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC1 BC11 BC18 BC5 CM20 CM22 E203 E210 E227 E235 E261 E27 E3 E41 E52 E61 E82 EM11 EM5 HR3 RA27 RA3 RA41 RA803 RA82 RA827 SQ21 T10 T27 T3 T35 T61 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1750; 08:59PM; 1265 N Lyman Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3YdfvY0; #EastHollywood; It took 32 firefighters 17 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames consuming a boarded-up residential structure (duplex? condo?). Thankfully, no one was found inside of the structure, and there were no reported injuries. The cause remains under active investigation.; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; AR1 BC11 BC2 BC5 CM20 CM22 E20 E220 E227 E235 E35 E450 E6 EM11 RA82 RA827 T20 T27 T35; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1750; 08:42PM; 1265 N Lyman Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3YdfvY0; #EastHollywood; Vacant two-story duplex with fire showing from the second floor (site of previous burn). Offensive mode.; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 BC5 E20 E220 E235 E35 E6 RA82 RA827 T20 T35; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0813; 12:18PM; 6303 S Overhill Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3S46cat; #HydePark; Firefighters responded to a two-story multi-family residential structure (four-plex?) with smoke showing from the second floor. The first 26 firefighters extinguished flames inside of one unit in 15 minutes, without injury. Cause under investigation.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 BC4 E205 E266 E295 E5 E66 E95 RA867 RA95 SQ21 T5 T66 T95; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

Update Structure Fire; INC#1476; 08:05PM; 3726 S Sawtelle Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3U2XlZc; #MarVista; The adult female occupant of the apartment involved with fire, is being taken to an area hospital by LAFD Paramedics in fair condition, following her exposure to copious smoke from the fire. There are no other injuries reported. The cause of the fire remains under investigation.; FS 62; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC18 BC4 E263 E292 E43 E59 E62 RA43 RA62 SO1 T63 T92; CH7; 12; Brian Humphrey
